entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this evening then cloudy with 70 percent chance of drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
